about_the_game: In this 2D pixel-art rogue-like game set in space, players will encounter a variety of bosses, robots, and extraterrestrial creatures on their journey through different planets and dungeons. Players can use various items to enhance their attack abilities and progress further through the levels. These items can be obtained through exploration or purchased with collected Gems at the in-game shop. With its retro-inspired graphics and challenging gameplay, this space-themed rogue-like game is sure to keep players engaged.
detailed_description: In this 2D pixel-art rogue-like game set in space, players will encounter a variety of bosses, robots, and extraterrestrial creatures on their journey through different planets and dungeons. Players can use various items to enhance their attack abilities and progress further through the levels. These items can be obtained through exploration or purchased with collected Gems at the in-game shop. With its retro-inspired graphics and challenging gameplay, this space-themed rogue-like game is sure to keep players engaged.

name: Cosmic Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cosmic Dungeon is a rogue-like game set in space, where players can explore unique dungeons filled with challenging enemies and treasure. With an array of different items and weapons to collect, players must strategically navigate the dangers of each level to progress deeper into the dungeon.
